data.title: Lorna Doone (1912 film)
data.text:
1912 British film

Lorna DooneDirected byWilfred NoyWritten byR. D. Blackmore (novel)StarringDorothy Bellew

Production

company

Clarendon Films

Distributed byGaumont British Distributors

Release date

CountryUnited KingdomLanguagesSilent

English intertitles

Lorna Doone is a 1912 British silent historical film directed by Wilfred Noy and starring Dorothy Bellew. The film is an adaptation of the 1869 novel Lorna Doone by R. D. Blackmore, set in Seventeenth century Devon.[1]

Cast

[edit]

Dorothy Bellew as Lorna Doone
